p: Glycyrrhizin, a bioactive compound of Chinese liquorice ( Glycyrrhiza uralensis Fisch), and lycorine isolated from Lycoris radiata L. showed strong anti-SARS-CoV activity ( Li et al., 2005). Subsequently, Fiore et al. (2008) extracted glycyrrhizin from Glycyrrhiza glabra and reported that glycyrrhizin is a potent inhibitor of SARS-CoV virus replication, and adsorption and penetration of virus during the early steps of the replicative cycle.
